title: Quinoa and vegetable soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '115g quinoa', '1 carrot, diced', '1 stick celery, diced', '1/2 onion, finely chopped', '1/2 green pepper, seeded and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '900ml chicken stock', '825ml water', '2 large tomatoes, finely chopped', '1/4 cabbage, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, for garnish']
